thread.title: BRIEF-Byline Bancorp Announces Receipt Of Regulatory Approval For Acquisition Of First Evanston Bancorp

title: BRIEF-Byline Bancorp Announces Receipt Of Regulatory Approval For Acquisition Of First Evanston Bancorp

organizations.name: acquisition of first evanston bancorp reuters

text:
April 18, 2018 / 12:15 PM / Updated 10 minutes ago BRIEF-Byline Bancorp Announces Receipt Of Regulatory Approval For Acquisition Of First Evanston Bancorp Reuters Staff 
April 18 (Reuters) - Byline Bancorp Inc: 
* BYLINE BANCORP, INC. ANNOUNCES RECEIPT OF REGULATORY APPROVAL FOR ACQUISITION OF FIRST EVANSTON BANCORP, INC. 
* BYLINE BANCORP, INC. ANNOUNCES RECEIPT OF REGULATORY APPROVAL FOR ACQUISITION OF FIRST EVANSTON BANCORP, INC. 
* BYLINE BANCORP INC - BYLINE AND FIRST EVANSTON EXPECT ACQUISITION WILL CLOSE BY END OF MAY 2018 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
